Uses of Interface
org.gm4java.engine.GMService

  • Packages that use GMService 
    Package Description
    org.gm4java.engine.support
    Provide implementations of GMService and GMConnection.

    • Uses of GMService in org.gm4java.engine.support

      Classes in org.gm4java.engine.support that implement GMService 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  PooledGMService
      A GMService that manages and uses a pool of GraphicsMagick instances.
      class  SimpleGMService
      Implementation of GMService that creates a new GraphicsMagick process every time SimpleGMService.getConnection() is called.
